amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, Legal Activities of the Department of Justice by $8 million and increases funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (prescription drug monitoring) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for salaries and expenses, legal activities of the Department of Justice by $8 million and to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (prescription drug monitoring) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
